subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Maria Riesch has a commanding lead in the overall World Cup Alpine standings, but Lindsey Vonn, the three-time defending champion, said she had not given up the chase.
snippet: Maria Riesch has a commanding lead in the overall World Cup Alpine standings, but Lindsey Vonn, the three-time defending champion, said she had not given up the chase.
